name: Monosight
description:
Monosight is a game that was created for the Game Maker's Toolkit Jam in 2019. It was a solo effort, and I wanted to do something silly and fairly easy, while also experimenting with some neat mechanics.

And that's how you ended out playing as a cyclops wearing 3D glasses.

The level is fairly short, and the art style is minimalist to support the puzzle mechanic of swapping between the cyan and red lenses of the 3D glasses to see different pieces of terrain and progress. There are a variety of puzzles I laid out as an experiment just to see how much potential the idea has.

Basically, it's a brief experiment!

Made in about 12 hours.
